item.title: Pipelines
item.description: Snakemake ATACseq pipeline ongoing Simple Snakemake pipeline for ATACseq used in Pasiniâ€™s lab. Code available here. *ongoing* *__ArtATAC__*: **A**utomated **r**eproducible **toolkit** for **ATAC**seq data processing, analysis and visualization. Snakemake pipeline to analyse ATACseq data. Code available [here](https://github.com/amitjavilaventura/ArtATAC). --- --

item.title: Shiny apps
item.description:
DPomics ongoing DPomics: DP lab omics visualization and integration. DPomics is a Shiny app designed to visualize omics data from the Pasini Lab (RNA-seq, ChIP-seq and integration.) Code available here. DPomics logo
DNAme DNAme is a Shiny app designed for learning purposes that converts a word to a DNA sequence. Code available here. DNAme logo

item.title: Miscellaneous
item.description: Custom R functions Simple R functions to solve diverse problems I am finding every day. Source code available here.
